bind off stitch bor - beginning of round co - cast on cuff eor - end of round co 48 52 56 60 sts with your k - knit preferred cast on method join sts in the k2tog - knit 2 stitches together knit-wise round and be careful not to twist them m - marker pm to indicate bor knit 2 by 2 rib for p - purl 24 rnds = *k2 p2* repeat from * to * pm - place marker p2tog - purl 2 together leg round s - round s knit 30 rounds in stockinette stitch until rs - right side heel starts sl - slip_stitch sl kw - slip 1 knit-wise heel sl pw- slip 1 purl-wise the heel is worked with yarn over short ssk - slip 1 knit-wise slip 1 knit-wise and row technique divide your stitches into knit 2 slipped sts together through the halves leave 1 half on your working back loop needle and place the other half of your st s - stitch es stitches instep on hold on spare tbl - knit through the back loop needle or scrap yarn ws
